data.title: Old Town Zagreb Airport
data.meta_description: A starting point for exploring the tourist offer of Zagreb, Velika Gorica and the Turopolje area. Sights, excursions, sports and gastronomy.
data.text:
Our website takes care of the protection and confidentiality of the personal data of website visitors, therefore the privacy policy we apply is aligned with the General Data Protection Regulation in force in the European Union.

You can find more information on the page PRIVACY.

Our website uses cookies to give you the best experience on our site. Cookie information is stored in your browser and performs functions such as saving the selected cookie settings or recognizing the previously selected language when you visit our website again.

You can find more information on the page COOKIES.

Our web site uses the following necessary cookies:

moove_gdpr_popup

PURPOSE: The GDPR Cookie Compliance plugin uses this cookie to save the cookie settings you have selected.

TYPE: Necessary cookie

DURATION: 1 year (this is the default duration, but cookie consent is set to expire in 6 months)

SOURCE: First page cookie

Enable or Disable Cookies

If you disable this cookie, we will not be able to save your settings. This means that you will have to approve or block cookies on each visit.

Our website uses the following analytics cookies:

_ga

PURPOSE: Google Analytics sets this cookie to calculate data about visitors, sessions and campaigns and to track the use of the site for the site analytics report. The cookie stores information anonymously and assigns a randomly generated number to identify unique visitors.

TYPE: Analytics

DURATION: 2 years

- (by default, but cookie consent is set to expire after 6 months)

SOURCE: Third party

_ga_*

PURPOSE: Google Analytics sets this cookie to store and count page views.

TYPE: Analytics

DURATION: 2 years

- (by default, but cookie consent is set to expire after 6 months)

SOURCE: Third Party

Enable or Disable Cookies

First, enable Necessary Cookies so we can save your preferences!
